title: Trades?  T3 McConnell, etc. (Sale Prices Added!)
author: Bosox Blair

posts.post_title: Trades?  T3 McConnell, etc. (Sale Prices Added!)
posts.post_content:
I have a few cards available to trade (or sell).  I'm interested mainly in pre-war Red Sox cards.  I prefer graded.  Try me - send me a PM!  

T3 McConnell - great color, paper loss/major chip on upper right corner, I believe there is a piece of tape on the reverse, but I'll check that and post a back scan soon too.  A nice card that looks better than its likely technical grade.  Price is $SOLD The McConnell is now SOLD!

Collins-McCarthy Milton Stock (SGC 40) - awesome centering, a real nice card for the grade, clean front and back (scan soon).  Price is $80 + shipping.

1948 Leaf Bobby Doerr (PSA 5).  Price is $45 + shipping.

1959 Fleer Ted Williams #63 (SGC 86) - this is the card from the set that has long been regarded as a "real card" of Ted and valued accordingly - nice pose with facsimile auto - obviously centered to the left, but a sharp card.  Price is $38 + shipping.

PM me with any trade offers!
Here's a scan of the reverse of the T3 McConnell.  Small piece of tape behind the same corner that is chipped on front.  Otherwise clean:

Oh loving that McConnell T3, I could definitely upgrade mine:



[IMG]http://i175.photobucket.com/albums/w129/scotty21690/PC/Red%20Sox%20Vintage%20PC%20NFT/t3mcconnellfront.jpg[/IMG]

Mine is in okay shape but it does have some staining....


Care to pm me with any players/sets you are looking for? :)

No trades came together, so I have posted prices on these cards - see first post.

(Still happy to get new trade offers too!)

Cheers,
Blair

I can bring any of these to the National...see first post.  Thanks!

Cheers,
Blair

Bump - still have these available!

Cheers,
Blair
